editorialSummary.text: Hardware store selling building materials, tools, paint, plumbing supplies & cleaning products.

originalText.text:
Very unhappy.
Make order  Friday and was schedule delivery in the morning 9 am. Waiting couple  hours. Every time when you call they just moving forward to time for 2 hours.
Pay employees money for day for nothing ðŸ˜ž
If you planning order delivery think twice.

text.text:
Very unhappy.
Make order  Friday and was schedule delivery in the morning 9 am. Waiting couple  hours. Every time when you call they just moving forward to time for 2 hours.
Pay employees money for day for nothing ðŸ˜ž
If you planning order delivery think twice.

originalText.text: Their handling of GSA/Govt orders is by the far the worst I have ever encountered. I placed the order, called and emailed for weeks, and finally got ahold of someone. They said without explanation or apology that they have the order and it would process and ship out in 3 days, they even charged my card for the order. over 3 weeks later I got nothing and I call again and they tell me it will ship out by the end of the week. We will see.

text.text: Their handling of GSA/Govt orders is by the far the worst I have ever encountered. I placed the order, called and emailed for weeks, and finally got ahold of someone. They said without explanation or apology that they have the order and it would process and ship out in 3 days, they even charged my card for the order. over 3 weeks later I got nothing and I call again and they tell me it will ship out by the end of the week. We will see.

originalText.text: Seems that they only care about men customers and whole sales. The person the front desk was unhelpful even when I ask his advice and rude. Also staff skip my turn when I was there before a guy came after me. If you have another alternative to buy your materials go somewhere else.

text.text: Seems that they only care about men customers and whole sales. The person the front desk was unhelpful even when I ask his advice and rude. Also staff skip my turn when I was there before a guy came after me. If you have another alternative to buy your materials go somewhere else.

originalText.text: first time going here to pick up building materials for a job on UES today.  All i can say is respect. front desk wants to get all builders in and out to the next job. Yard workers picked materials fast and got them in my truck fast. in this business we need speed because time is money. Ill be back for sure

originalText.text: The guys have great customer service and the materials are cost friendly, they helped wrapped up the weld for me and my father to bring home. Recommend everyone to go to this lumber spot.
